Comment¶

Interfaces with the Comment model.

cccenter.python.comment.get_comments(challenge_id)¶

Returns the comments associated with the given Challenge.

Parameters:challenge_id (int) – The challenge’s associated object’s id number
Returns:All the comments associated with the challenge
Return type:[models.Comment]

Note

The return type is actually a query set, but can be treated as a list of Comment objects.
